name: SleepWalk
description:
Sleepwalk is an independent first-person horror and survival game, notable for being one of the rare titles in the Brazilian indie game scene. Players wake up in an unknown location with no memories and embark on a journey to uncover the story and escape, solving complex puzzles while being pursued by mysterious threats. The oppressive atmosphere, immersive gameplay, and the intensity of the chases make Sleepwalk a distressing and engaging experience for fans of horror and survival games. Get ready to face your fears and unravel the dark secrets of this nightmare.

Game Time: 2-3 Hours (Depends on Player)


Plot:

The plot of Sleepwalk begins with the player waking up in a completely unknown location, plunged into darkness and devoid of any memory of how they got there. The protagonist embarks on a journey of discovery of history, as he desperately tries to escape the sinister place in which he finds himself. Each new step is an opportunity to uncover the hidden secrets behind this harrowing experience.

Gameplay:

The game Sleepwalk challenges players to complete complex puzzles and solve intriguing riddles as part of their quest for freedom. First-person mechanics heighten the sense of immersion, immersing players in the game's dark and oppressive world.

Agonizing Persecutions:

One of the most striking characteristics of Sleepwalk is the intensity of the chases throughout the narrative. Players constantly find themselves in life-or-death situations, forced to flee from mysterious and terrifying threats that lurk around the environment. The agony of being chased creates palpable tension, keeping players on the edge of their seats.

Environment and Atmosphere:

Sleepwalk is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere of authentic horror. The graphics and soundtrack contribute to the feeling of helplessness and isolation, while environmental design elements add to the feeling of mystery and constant fear.

Features:

1 - Realistic Graphics: Sleepwalk stands out for its realistic graphics, which immerse players in a dark and detailed world, increasing the feeling of immersion.

2 - Secret History of the Protagonist: An intriguing feature of the game is the secret history of the protagonist. Players can gradually uncover the details of their mysterious past as they progress through the narrative, creating an added element of suspense and motivation.

3 - Descriptive Letters and Documents: Players can collect letters and documents throughout the game, which offer insights and clues about the game's history and world. These objects provide an additional layer of depth to the narrative, encouraging exploration and immersion.

4 - Dark and Enigmatic Environment: The game presents a sinister and enigmatic environment, full of secrets and mysteries. Players are challenged to explore every corner of the scenario, looking for clues and solutions to puzzles while facing an atmosphere of constant terror.

5 - Puzzle Challenges: Sleepwalk offers a series of complex puzzle challenges, which players must solve to advance the narrative and escape the unknown location. These puzzles increase interactivity and player engagement while maintaining the survival aspect of the game.
